TextView.android:text:
- Start a new game by clicking on the 'Play' button.
- If you wish to change the default game parameters, you may change the 'Allow duplicates' and/or sound level fields before you start a new game.
- To start filling a line, you must first select a color at the bottom of the screen by clicking on it.
- After selecting a color you can just put it in the current guess line above by clicking on the desired position.
- Click on the 'Check' button and get the system's response.
- After 10 shots, a 'give up' button will appear at the bottom of the screen. You can use this option to expose the secret and finish the game.
Enjoy :)
